contentrichtext.text: {{Italic title prefixed|3}} Two ships of the [[United States Navy]] have borne the name '''''Briscoe'''''. * The {{USS|Briscoe|APA-65}}, was a ''Gilliam''-class attack transport laid down in 1944, served during World War II, and decommissioned in 1946. This ship was named in honor of [[Briscoe County, Texas]]. * The {{USS|Briscoe|DD-977}}, was a ''Spruance''-class destroyer laid down in 1975 and decommissioned in 2003. This ship was named in honor of Admiral [[Robert P. Briscoe]]. ==References== *{{DANFS|http://www.history.navy.mil/danfs/b9-list.htm}} {{Shipindex}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Briscoe}} [[Category:United States Navy ship names]]
